heroSection.description: Track, manage, and reduce your carbon footprint with Green Genius.

feature_section.title: Designed for business teams like yours
feature_section.description: Here at Green Genius, we focus on sustainable practices that help your business reduce its carbon footprint and contribute to a healthier planet.

sustainable_supply_management.title: Sustainable Supply Management
sustainable_supply_management.description: Track carbon-related purchases for sustainable sourcing and a reduced footprint.

emission_source_tracking.title: Emission Source Tracking
emission_source_tracking.description: Monitor production footprints to find opportunities for emission reduction.

track_transportation.title: Track Transportation
track_transportation.description: Optimize and manage facility CO2 emissions for improved efficiency.

comprehensive_waste_management.title: Comprehensive Waste Management
comprehensive_waste_management.description: Manage and reduce waste with proper disposal and recycling to minimize impact.

carbon_footprint_analysis.title: Carbon Footprint Analysis
carbon_footprint_analysis.description: Calculate CO2 footprint and generate reports to track sustainability progress.

about.title: About Green Genius
about.description: Green Genius is dedicated to helping businesses in general and textile specifically reduce their carbon footprint. Our platform provides comprehensive tools to track, manage, and report carbon emissions across various operations. We aim to empower companies to make informed decisions for a sustainable future.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference? Start Your Sustainability Journey with Green Genius!
cta.subtitle: Join us in making a positive impact on the environment.

footer.description: Green Genius is a SaaS platform that helps businesses track, manage, and reduce their carbon footprint. It offers tools for supply management, order management, transportation, waste management, and CO2 reporting to support sustainable solutions.
